page.title: 16CLUBS AND ACTIVITIES
page.content: Many people from this thinly populated area go to Hereford for sports clubs and{leisure pursuits, but there are various local activities for young and old.{ {"Adventurers",}organised by the Ewyas Harold team ministry, and similar to Sunday School, is held at Wormbridge School on Wednesday afternoons. The school is also used for meetings of {Wormbridge W.I., the Parish Council, {school governors and the Parent {Teachers Association. Many residents are involved with functions, fund raising activities and entertainment at Kilpeck Village Hall, which is also used by the local Art Club. The{"Wormbridge News"}is a kind of parish magazine.Besides church news, it contains letters, gardening advice, local events, school news, football news and much more besides.
